name: Hyper Bunny Farmer (Introducing Chaos Example Project)
name_original: Hyper Bunny Farmer (Introducing Chaos Example Project)
description:
Hyper Bunny Farmer is an exploration of character-driven & event-driven procedural narrative systems implemented in a cute game about a bunny who is a farmer!

Created for Game Devs of Color Expo 2022

Download Project Files
